field.name: Header title
field.description: Add a title (Go to styling to change the size)

field.name: Header subtitle
field.description: Add a subtitle (Go to styling to change the size)

field.name: Type
field.description: What should the group slider be based upon?

field.name: Slider ratio
field.description: Select a ratio for your slider items. If you have varying content/images in your slider items - it's recommended to use Original

field.name: Arrow style
field.description: Navigation arrows are shown when hovering the slider. Enable "always visible" to keep navigation visible.

field.name: Navigation slide all visible items together
Theme
field.description: Select a theme (background and text color) to style the slider

field.name: Group theme
field.description: Select a theme (background and text color) to style each group item in the slider

field.name: Stretched link
field.description: Stretch the link to make the whole item clickable or if you have added a link without a button label

option.name: No, do not stretch the link
Yes, stretch the link and make the whole item clickable

field.name: Title size
field.description: Do you want to make your title font size smaller or larger? Select a font size for well-sized content

field.name: Subtitle size
field.description: Do you want to make your subtitle font size smaller or larger? Select a font size for well-sized content

field.name: Text readability
field.description: Having the right amount of characters on each line is key to readability. This setting is activated by default and will shorten the number of characters on each line. We encourage you to have it on if you find yourself having to move your neck/head to read the text in a single column. Otherwise, disable it and the text will then be limited by the column width.
